t: Josie Maran cosmetics trademark case tests strategy of controlling branded product sales on Amazon
s: July 10, 2020 - A recent trademark-infringement suit brought in federal court in Los Angeles by cosmetics brand Josie Maran against an unauthorized Amazon reseller raises a number of interesting issues about how trademark law can be used to control to whom and where branded products are sold.
